document.full_text: polish teams could play to empty stadiums as part of a crackdown on hooliganism, prime minister donald tusk said on wednesday, a day after violent scenes at the polish cup final dealt another blow to the euro 2012 co-hosts' image.
document.title: polish pm targets hooligans after cup final riot
lines_and_colors: polish teams could play to empty stadiums as part of a crackdown on hooliganism, prime minister donald tusk said on wednesday, a day after violent scenes at the polish cup final dealt another blow to the euro 2012 co-hosts' image.
